1: I wholeheartedly praise the LORD among the righteous.
2: I seek joy in the great works around me.
3: His work is glorious and his righteousness lasts forever.
4: I cherish and remember the kindness and compassion around me.
5: I enjoy abundance and trust in lasting promises.
6: I celebrate the strength of greatness and embrace my blessings.
7: His creations inspire truth and fairness in my life.
8: I stand firm in truth and integrity always.
9: I embrace the lasting promise of redemption and honor the sacred name.
10: Reverence fosters wisdom, leading to enduring understanding and praise.
